headline: Baxter recalls certain Novum pumps over issues tied to 79 injuries, 2 deaths
summary: The company has advised users to change the pump and infusion set at a time when a delay in treatment would not harm the patient.

raw.headline: Baxter recalls certain Novum pumps over issues tied to 79 injuries, 2 deaths
raw.summary: The company has advised users to change the pump and infusion set at a time when a delay in treatment would not harm the patient.

headline: Vizient Reserve Program Expands Supply Assurance to Include IV Fluids in Collaboration With Baxter
summary: IRVING, Texas, July 23, 2025--Vizient announced today the expansion of the Vizient Reserve Program to include IV fluids through a strategic partnership with Baxter.
